Battery.NAME: Battery
Battery.DESCRIPTION: Choose a rechargeable relic and fully recharge it. Ethereal. Exhaust.
Battery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a rechargeable relic and fully it. Exhaust.

BettingIsNotGood.NAME: Gambling
BettingIsNotGood.DESCRIPTION: Randomly do one of the follwing: NL 1.lose 3 HP; 2.heal 5 HP; 3.deal !D! damage to ALL enemies; 4.gain 15 Gold. NL Exhaust.
BettingIsNotGood.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Randomly do one of the follwing: NL 1.lose 6 HP; 2.heal 10 HP; 3.deal !D! damage to ALL enemies; 4.gain 25 Gold.

BloodyBrimstone.NAME: Bloody Brimstone
BloodyBrimstone.DESCRIPTION: Lose 3 Max HP, deal real damage equal to !M! % of your Max HP (minimum 30) to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
BloodyBrimstone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 3 Max HP, deal real damage equal to !M! % of the highest Max HP of ALL enemies (minimum 40) to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

Bomb.NAME: Bomb
Bomb.DESCRIPTION: Deal 40 damage to ALL enemies. Remove this card from your deck permanently. Cannot be upgraded. Exhaust.

Cancel.NAME: Undo
Cancel.DESCRIPTION: Set your HP to what it was last turn. Exhaust.

Distribution.NAME: Allocate
Distribution.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Strength. Lose 1 Dexterity. Gain !M! Focus.

DoctorFetus.NAME: Doctor Fetus
DoctorFetus.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a Quick Bomb that costs !M! to your hand.

ElectricPowerLearning.NAME: Antique Electrodynamics
ElectricPowerLearning.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lightning now hits ALL enemies. If there is only one enemy, Lightning will hit twice.

EpicFetus.NAME: Epic Fetus
EpicFetus.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add a [Epic Attack] to your hand.
EpicFetus.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add a [Epic Attack +] to your hand.

Pulse.NAME: Pulse
Pulse.DESCRIPTION: Trigger the passive ability of all Orbs once. Exhaust.
Pulse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Trigger the passive ability of all Orbs once.

EpicFetusAttack.NAME: Epic Attack
EpicFetusAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deal half of that damage to ALL other enemies. Exhaust. Ethereal.

MyBomb.NAME: Quick Bomb
MyBomb.DESCRIPTION: At the end of 2 turns, deal 40 damage to ALL enemies. Ethereal. Exhaust.

ChaosCard.NAME: Chaos Card
ChaosCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to 99% of the Max HP of the target. This card will be removed from the deck permanently if used or Exhuasted. Cannot be upgraded. Exhaust. Ethereal.
